title: 33 Immortals Was the Most Pleasant Playable Surprise of the Xbox Showcase
description:
We played a six-player round of 33 Immortals, the upcoming 33-player co-op action roguelike from the makers of Spiritfarer. We were duly impressed by the way the game design encourages cooperative play and makes it feel unique to the many other roguelikes out there.

Presented by the United States Air Force

title: Respawn Worked on Titanfall 3 Before Pivoting to Apex Legends, Ex-Dev Reveals - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Respawn Entertainment worked on Titanfall 3 "in earnest" for ten months before ditching it for Apex Legends, a former developer has revealed. Xbox Game Studios head Matt Booty comments on Redfall's release. Finally, Xbox Game Studios boss Matt Booty has claimed Starfield already has fewer bugs than Skyrim, Fallout 4, or any other Bethesda game.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Immortals of Aveum - Exclusive Goliath Level Extended Gameplay | Summer of Gaming 2023
description:
Check out 6 minutes of exclusive gameplay from Immortals of Aveum in this action-packed video, showcasing magic-based combat against multiple enemies and various mission objectives in the Goliath level from the upcoming first-person magic shooter game. Immortals of Aveum will be available on July 20, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Exoprimal - Official Savage Gauntlet Game Mode Trailer
description:
Savage Gauntlet is a brand-new player versus environment (PvE) game mode coming to Exoprimal. In this new co-op game mode, five-player teams take on PvE scenarios that rotate weekly. These limited-time missions are late-game content that offers a higher level of challenge. Exofighters are encouraged to take leveled-up Exosuits into these combat tests and equip Module power-ups. Savage Gauntlet presents squads across the world with the same objective and the Exoprimal community is invited to vie for the fastest completion time. The missions are replayable and groups are welcome to come back and try new strategies to achieve higher rankings and even earn rewards.

Exoprimal is an online, team-based action game pitting humanity’s futuristic Exosuit technology against history’s most ferocious beasts – dinosaurs. Set in 2040, players are pulled into wargames orchestrated by the advanced A.I. Leviathan. In the main game mode Dino Survival, teams of five Exofighters race to complete objectives while fending off hordes of dinosaurs to survive. Each match is different from the last, and players can swap between Exosuits at any time and change their tactics as new challenges arise. Along the way, players will unlock story sequences and earn rewards to customize their Exosuits. 

Exoprimal releases worldwide on July 14 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC via Steam.

#IGN #Exoprimal #SummerofGaming

title: Sand Land: Hands-On Impressions | IGN Summer of Gaming
description:
We played Sand Land, the upcoming game based on the manga of the same name from Dragon Ball creator Akira Toriyama. We give our reactions to going hands-on with gameplay from the action RPG.

Stay tuned to IGN Summer of Gaming 2023 for all of your PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and PC game news, reveals, and gameplay.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming

title: Sonic Superstars: Preview Impressions
description:
Sonic is returning to its classic 2D roots in Sonic Superstars. We saw some new gameplay which made a positive impression on us.

Stay tuned to IGN Summer of Gaming 2023 for all of your PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and PC game news, reveals, and gameplay.

Presented by The Marines.

#IGN #Gaming #Sonic

title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Preview Impressions
description:
We got a preview look at some Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora gameplay and let you know what we think of Ubisoft’s upcoming open-world shooter.

Stay tuned to IGN Summer of Gaming 2023 for all of your PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and PC game news, reveals, and gameplay.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Preview Impressions
description:
We got a look at Assassin's Creed Mirage and were left impressed by what we saw of Ubisoft's latest open-world stealth action sim.

Stay tuned to IGN Summer of Gaming 2023 for all of your PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and PC game news, reveals, and gameplay.

title: Immortals of Aveum: The Magic of The Game
description:
Immortals of Aveum allows you to control 3 distinct types of magic to fight back against the oppressive Rasharnian regime. Get a sneak preview of some of the magical abilities you can use in the game, courtesy of IGN's Alan Wheeler, an immortal in training who might need more practice before he's ready to save the realms.

Presented by Immortals of Aveum

title: They Cloned Tyrone - Official Trailer (2023) Jamie Foxx, John Boyega, Teyonah Parris
description:
They Cloned Tyrone follows a series of multiple creepy and eerie events that propels an unlikely trio onto a trail that leads to the discovery of a nefarious government conspiracy.

They Cloned Tyrone stars John Boyega, Teyonah Parris, David Alan Grier, J. Alphonse Nicholson, Tamberla Perry, Eric Robinson Jr. with Kiefer Sutherland, and Jamie Foxx. Juel Taylor is directing the movie along with Tony Rettenmaier and Juel Taylor is writing the movie. They Cloned Tyrone is produced by Charles D. King, Stephen “Dr.” Love, Tony Rettenmaier, Juel Taylor, Jamie Foxx, and Datari Turner with the executive producers being Mark R. Wright, Kim Roth, Jack Murray, Dana Sano, and Monte Lipman. Co-executive producers for They Cloned Tyrone are James Lopez and Poppy Hanks.

They Cloned Tyrone is releasing on July 21 exclusively on Netflix.

#IGN #Movies

title: Hyper Light Breaker - Official World Overview Trailer
description: Hyper Light Breaker is a new 3D co-op adventure set in the beloved Hyper Light universe – launching in Steam Early Access. For the very first time, players will be able to explore the world of Hyper Light in 3D via single-player or online cooperative multiplayer. The game is currently in development from the same award-winning studio that created the critically-acclaimed Hyper Light Drifter, with the original creative director, Alx Preston, leading the charge. You can wishlist it on Steam if you'd like:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534840/Hyper_Light_Breaker/

title: Why Persona 3 Reload Is Set to Be The Series New Best Entry Point | Summer of Gaming 2023
description:
Persona 3 Reload is a ground-up remake of the beloved Atlus RPG. With new voice acting, music, and updated graphics, Persona 3 is shaping up to be better than ever. We spoke to members of the dev team on IGN Summer of Gaming to learn more about it.

Presented by The Xfinity 10G Network

#IGN #Gaming

title: Lightyear Frontier - Official Gameplay Walkthrough | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2023
description: Take a look at the multiplayer features of Lightyear Frontier in this gameplay video, revealed during the Xbox Games Extended Showcase 2023 on June 12, 2023. Watch as the team works together to gather resources and highlight building elements from this upcoming open-world farming mech adventure game. Lightyear Frontier will be available in Early Access in Early 2024 on Xbox Series S/X and PC.

title: Disney and Pixar's Elio - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) America Ferrera, Jameela Jamil
description:
Check out the teaser trailer for Disney and Pixar's Elio, an upcoming movie starring America Ferrera, Yonas Kibreab, Jameela Jamil, and Brad Garrett.

For centuries, people have called out to the universe looking for answers—in Disney and Pixar’s all-new movie “Elio,” the universe calls back! The original feature film introduces Elio, an underdog with an active imagination who finds himself inadvertently beamed up to the Communiverse, an interplanetary organization with representatives from galaxies far and wide. Mistakenly identified as Earth’s ambassador to the rest of the universe, and completely unprepared for that kind of pressure, Elio must form new bonds with eccentric alien lifeforms, survive a series of formidable trials and somehow discover who he is truly meant to be. 

Directed by Adrian Molina (screenwriter and co-director of “Coco”) and produced by Mary Alice Drumm (associate producer of “Coco”), the film features the voices of America Ferrera as Elio’s mom, Olga; Jameela Jamil as Ambassador Questa; Brad Garrett as Ambassador Grigon; and Yonas Kibreab as the title character. 

Elio releases in theaters on March 1, 2024.

#IGN #Pixar

title: Lies of P - Gameplay Overview Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Lies of P promises brutal, Souls-like combat in a dark Belle Époque world, with a brand new look at some of the enemies, bosses, and abilities you'll use as you navigate this hostile Pinocchio story retelling. Lies of P is coming out on September 19.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Star Wars Outlaws Looks Like Watch Dogs and Grand Theft Auto
description: Seth Macy talks to Max Scoville about his thoughts on the Star Wars Outlaws gameplay trailer for Summer of Gaming.

title: 33 Immortals - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Xbox head Phil Spencer joins Thunder Lotus creative director Stephan Logier and CEO Will Dubé for a run of 33 Immortals, the upcoming cooperative roguelike that allows up to 33 players to play together as they rebel against God's judgment and fight for eternal life. It's coming in 2024.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: We Saw Forza Motorsport Gameplay on Xbox Series X: Here's What We Learned
description:
We got to see a full demonstration of Forza Motorsport, and one thing is clear: Turn 10 wants you to get your hands dirty in this next-gen reboot. We tell you everything we saw and learned. The Forza Motorsport gameplay was demoed on a developer Xbox Series X console. All impressions are from a behind-closed-doors demonstration of Forza Motorsport Xbox Series X gameplay that took us through the entire Forza presentation live. 

Presented by The Marines.

title: Forza Motorsport Gameplay Demo on Xbox Series X 4K 60FPS
description: The Turn 10 team takes us through Xbox Series X Forza Motorsport gameplay and explains how the new systems will work as you race to unlock new car components. This 4K Forza Motorsport gameplay was captured on an Xbox Series X and demos what we can expect from this sim racer when it launches this October.

title: Hellblade II: Senua's Saga - Behind the Scenes Clip | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
The team at Ninja Theory go over the reveal at the Xbox Showcase and an inside look as to how their performance capture has become better.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator - Dune Ornithopter Behind The Scenes Clip | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
The ornithopter from 2021's Dune is coming to Microsoft Flight Simulator, so Xbox showed off a real life ornithopter built for the film, and explained the science behind getting these strange contraptions working in the simulator in an in-game rendition of the planet Arrakis. This expansion releases on November 3, 2023.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Exoprimal - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Exoprimal Director Takuro Hiraoka announces a new mode coming to Exoprimal at launch called Savage Gauntlet. Exoprimal will release Day One on Xbox Game Pass July 14th later this year.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Phasmophobia - Official Console Early Access Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
The hit ghostbusting Phasmophobia is making its way to console early access in August later this year.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Creative director Rich Lambert and art director CJ Grebb explain the upcoming Necrom expansion, which is out now on PC and Mac and coming to Xbox and PlayStation consoles on June 20, 2023.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Hi-Fi Rush: Arcade Challenge - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Hi-Fi Rush is getting a brand new Arcade Challenge update. Game director John Johanes breaks down everything that's new. Arcade Challenge includes two new modes that unlock once you finish Hi-Fi Rush. One, BPM Rush Mode, takes the game to much higher speeds, and Power Up Tower Up is a randomized spin on the existing rhythm tower mode. There are five new songs, two new enemies, and much more.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Fallout 76: Once in a Blue Moon - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Bethesda art director Jon Rush explains the new Once in a Blue Moon update, which will be free to play for all who already own Fallout 76. With the rise of the blue moon, players will encounter new cryptids, a horde of cultists, and two new public events that will offer currency and new rewards. Once in a Blue Moon debuts June 20, and an Atlantic City update will follow it at a later date.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Hi-Fi Rush: Arcade Challenge - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Return to the Vandelay Technologies campus in this new update for Hi-Fi Rush including new modes and much much more.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Fallout 76: Once in a Blue Moon - Official Teaser Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Check out the latest addition to Fallout 76 which includes new creatures including...werewolves?! The new update releasing later this month on June 20th.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Towerborne - Developer Game Overview l Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Towerborne is a new co-op adventure from the same team that made The Banner saga, coming in 2024 and releasing at launch on Xbox Game Pass.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: First Descendent - Official Game Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description: First Descendent is an upcoming looter shooter from Nexon featuring co-op play coming to PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One, with a Steam beta this October. Nexon producer Beom-jun Lee explains the game's free-to-play, cross-platform structure, unique combat, and more in this overview.

title: Avowed - Game Overview with Carrie Patel | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Game director Carrie Patel talks about Obsidian's upcoming magic and fantasy RPG, Avowed, which is headed Xbox Series X/S and Steam in 2024. Though it's set in the Pillars of Eternity universe and includes some connections to Pillars games, you don't need to have played these games to understand Avowed.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty - Game Overview with Keanu Reeves | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Join Keanu Reeves as he gives us a glimpse of what to expect in the upcoming DLC for Cyberpunk 2077, Phantom Liberty coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: The Lamplighters League - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Join a group of bandits and scoundrels in this  new tactics game from the creators of the Shadow Run Return Series. Coming to Xbox Game Pass Day One on October 3rd later this year.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: High on Knife - Teaser Trailer | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
High on Life is a sci-fi FPS full of talking guns, zany antics, and an unexpected alien invasion. It's available now on Xbox Series S|X, Xbox One, Xbox Game Pass, Steam, and Epic Games Store, and during the Xbox Extended Showcase, we got a teaser of a horrifying new update to the game called High on...Knife? It's coming soon.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty - Gameplay Overview | Xbox Extended Showcase 2023
description:
Dive into the underbelly of Night City in the upcoming DLC for Cyberpunk 2077, Phantom Liberty. Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Xbox #SummerofGaming

title: Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections - Official Character Trailer
description:
Boruto (Karma), Kawaki, and Jigen are coming to Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections. Check out the latest trailer to see these characters and more. Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections will be available in 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Naruto

title: Star Wars: Outlaws Trailer and Gameplay Breakdown | Summer of Gaming 2023
description:
Ubisoft Massive revealed the first trailer and gameplay deep dive for Star Wars: Outlaws. We looked at both trailers closely to find all kinds of hidden secrets and story implications for the newest Star Wars game.

Presented by the United States Air Force

#IGN #Gaming #StarWarsOutlaws

title: Hyper Light Breaker is a Procedural Open-World Roguelite on a Skateboard | Summer of Gaming 2023
description:
Hyper Light Breaker developer Heart Machine tells us all about how the sequel has evolved from Hyper Light Drifter, how its procedural open world works, and the Hades and Zelda inspirations behind it.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming

title: Gord Preview: A Dark and Unforgiving Survival Game from Former Witcher Devs
description:
We got our first hands-on with Gord, a new dark-fantasy city-builder/management game from ex-Witcher developers in which you'll have to build your settlement and then keep your townsfolk happy (and also sane) while terrifying creatures from Slavic lore prey on them. Previewed on PC by Travis Northup.

#IGN

title: Poor Things - Official Trailer (2023) Emma Stone, Willem Dafoe
description:
Check out the trailer for Poor Things, an upcoming movie starring Emma Stone, Mark Ruffalo, Willem Dafoe, Ramy Youssef, Jerrod Carmichael, and Christopher Abbott.

From filmmaker Yorgos Lanthimos and producer Emma Stone comes the incredible tale and fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter (Stone), a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter (Willem Dafoe). Under Baxter’s protection, Bella is eager to learn. Hungry for the worldliness she is lacking, Bella runs off with Duncan Wedderburn (Mark Ruffalo), a slick and debauched lawyer, on a whirlwind adventure across the continents. Free from the prejudices of her times, Bella grows steadfast in her purpose to stand for equality and liberation.

Poor Things opens in theaters on September 8, 2023.

#IGN #Movies #PoorThings

title: Overwatch 2 - Official Season 5 Trailer
description:
Watch the Overwatch 2: Season 5 trailer to see what to expect with the latest season, featuring a new battle pass, the introduction of Mythic Skin Progression, a new prop hunt game mode, the return of the Summer Games, and more. Season 5 of Overwatch 2 kicks off today, June 13, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Overwatch

title: Grading the Showcases for PlayStation Players
description:
IGN's Beyond Crew grades the showcases based on their value to PlayStation players. Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Mat Kim, and Akeem Lawanson talk about the Capcom Showcase 2023, Summer Games Fest, the PlayStation Showcase 2023, the Ubisoft Showcase 2023, and the Xbox Showcase 2023.

Presented by the United States Air Force.

title: Why Did Capcom Need a Showcase?
description:
IGN's Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Matt Kim, and Akeem Lawanson talk about how the Capcom Showcase 2023 was underwhelming, overall. That's not to say there wasn't highlights, the gang talks some of the new Dragon Dogma II footage; Capcom's new game, Path of the Goddess; and Jada's hands-on time with Exoprimal.

Presented by Lenovo Legion.
